name: Emporio Ivankov
text: On Play: Draw cards until you have 3 cards in your hand, then play up to 1 blue {Impel Down} type Character card with a cost of 6 or less from your hand.

effect.text: Draw cards until you have 3 cards in your hand, then play up to 1 blue {Impel Down} type Character card with a cost of 6 or less from your hand.
